import React from "react"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import "./Home.css"; import dairyImage from "../assets/dairy.jpg"; const Home = () => { return (

Premium Dairy Products Delivered Fresh

Experience farm-to-table freshness with our organic dairy products. Quality you can taste, delivered to your doorstep.

Shop Now Track Orders

Why Choose Our Dairy Farm?

We're committed to delivering the highest quality dairy products while supporting sustainable farming practices.

100% Organic Milk

Our cows are grass-fed and raised without antibiotics or hormones, ensuring pure, natural milk.

üöö

Fresh from our farm to your table within hours. We guarantee freshness and quality.

Sustainable Farming

Eco-friendly practices that protect the environment while producing superior dairy products.

Quality Assured

Every product undergoes rigorous quality checks to meet the highest industry standards.

Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust us for their daily dairy needs. Start your journey to better health today.

); }; export default Home;
